page.title: 16A child's Sunday.
page.content: I start the day with a sluggish run of about two and a half miles followed by a light breakfast.I then walk to my friend's house for a lift to Church.I am a Pentecostal.This means that you believe in gifts of the Spirit and I go to an Assemblies of God church.The morning meeting usually begins with much singing,dancing and clapping.There are maybe two hymns, Communion and a time of open prayer, praise and worship.During this time people wait on their gifts and give messages in tongues.These are then interpreted by others.After dinner at my friend's house we listen to records or take a short walk.In the evening the little church is usually full half an hour before the meeting starts.Then everyone goes crazy.There's more time for praise.It's great.I arrive home, thoroughly exhausted at 9 o'clock.
